title: ORNN and what Ornn might be
body:
For this topic I was thinking of making a video but i thought it  would be better if I just made boards post .
The reason why i did not make a video Im bad at making videos :(.

 So In other question believe Ornn is a ram or a mountain goat or some kind of animal hybrid. but i thought about it and  feljoird does not have mountains
so he can possibly be from mount Targon that was another theory. 

Why do i think Ornn is a ram or a goat ,if you kook at braum he has his belt and shield representing  a long horned animal
since hes claimed to be a blacksmith i assume he made this especially for Braum and also for some other champions.
i looked through Braums lore and the  interactive video to see if i could find anything but no there was no traveler who gave him this shield  he got it from the door of some place a troll boy was trapped.
There could be a possibility that Ornn wanted to to test if Braum was a true whole heart'ed hero and he trap'ed the little troll boy at a test for Braum and he left the shield there for him to take.

Another  reason also think Ornn is a goat or bull the only animal i think of when  i  here the word mountain is goat or billy goat most likely  influenced to me when i was a kid watching TV .

i think i figured out before the more popular people such as breofresco and redmercy so please subscribe to my youutbe .

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC72suHfJpXznIQDaOAP7J9w

replies.body:
Wait wait wait - why do you think that the Freljord doesn't have mountains?

http://universe-meeps.leagueoflegends.com/v1/assets/images/factions/image-gallery/freljord-rakelstake.jpg

http://universe-meeps.leagueoflegends.com/v1/assets/images/factions/image-gallery/freljord-vaults.jpg
Not to mention the mountain that Braum punched through.

To be fair, that mountain is no one anymore.
So if that had been the only mountain in Freljord, Braum had successfully made them extinct. ^^
freljord has a whole mountain range...
True thought so too. Every cold and windy north need at least one big mountain.
idk what you mean i see a big piece of ice
you guys should let me help design the new champ or just give me Rp since i guessed the new champ first a right Ornn the blacksmith is a big horned mountain goat  or give me one special request
But it was already said in Braums lore that the door was used by Lissandra,the ice witch...

Sorry dude, you're reaching when there isn't even a ledge to tiptoe on.

The lore says the door was used by lissandra. It could have been made by Ornn, but it's not going to be something that was intended for Braum or specifically given to him. They wouldn't undo his lore without good reason.

Additionally, you're dismissing the presence of mountains every time people point them out, even specifically a Rioter. That makes your claims look more like grasping at straws rather than reasonable or open minded assertions.

On top of that you're asking to design a champion or to get some RP... to which I've got to say, "get in line." There are a lot of people who want this, some of whom even design very cool champion concepts in Concepts & Creations.

If you want these things you've got to put the same work into it that everyone else does. And probably apply for a job at Riot. If you show the dedication and passion for champion design then you might qualify!

Follow your dreams, but don't do it half-assed.
I think I'll let you sit at 45 subs... no point in ruining such a good number when you have like 6 videos...
i want more tho i need more subs to make better videos

Maybe make some educated guess and don't just throw shit out there that isn't correct. No one is gonna waste a subscription on a channel with 6 videos and a creator with no idea about lore or the game.
his shield isn't even a shield its a door specifically lissandra's door.
If  im right bless me with some rp
